title: Mac Bug or just my Mac?
body: Every single game i play no matter if it's in bots, PvP or Ranked my Mac just freezes from 0-10 minutes in and i have to manually restart my Macbook pro and reload into the game and i keep getting 5x 20Min Queue's? I'm so over it because I've probably had 5 sets of queue's in the last 3 weeks when this isn't my problem, I'm not leaving games intentionally so this is unfair. can i get help or at least remove these queues?
